articles.title: Asia shares skittish as banks face default stress - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares struggled on Monday while U.S. and European stock futures edged higher on hopes authorities were working to ring fence stress in the global banking system, even as the cost of insuring against default neared dangerous levels.
articles.content: SYDNEY, March 27 (Reuters) - Asian shares struggled on Monday while U.S. and European stock futures edged higher on hopes authorities were working to ring fence stress in the global banking system, e… [+3005 chars]

articles.title: Asia markets trade mixed as banking sector stress lingers - CNBC
articles.description: Asian markets trade higher as they see retail sales data out of Japan and Australia
articles.content:
